message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_GROUP_MEMBER_FV_ROLE_NOT_SELECTED
message.locale: 'Role' of the provider group member must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_GROUP_MEMBER_XRV_TO_DATE_EARLIER_THAN_FROM_DATE
message.locale: The To date, %1d, must be on or after the From date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_GROUP_MEMBER_XRV_FROM_DATE_EARLIER_THAN_ENROLLMENT_DATE_OF_PROVIDER_GROUP
message.locale: The 'From Date' must not be earlier than the 'Enrollment Date' of the Provider group, %1d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_GROUP_MEMBER_XRV_FROM_DATE_LATER_THAN_END_DATE_OF_PROVIDER_GROUP
message.locale: The 'From Date' must not be later than the 'End Date' of the Provider group, %1d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_GROUP_MEMBER_XRV_FROM_DATE_EARLIER_THAN_ENROLLMENT_DATE_OF_PROVIDER_GROUP_MEMBER
message.locale: The 'From Date' must not be earlier than the 'Enrollment Date' of the Provider group member, %1d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_GROUP_MEMBER_XRV_FROM_DATE_LATER_THAN_END_DATE_OF_PROVIDER_GROUP_MEMBER
message.locale: The 'From Date' must not be later than the 'End Date' of the Provider group member, %1d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_GROUP_MEMBER_XRV_TO_DATE_EARLIER_THAN_ENROLLMENT_DATE_OF_PROVIDER_GROUP
message.locale: The 'To Date' must not be earlier than the 'Enrollment Date' of the Provider group, %1d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_GROUP_MEMBER_XRV_TO_DATE_LATER_THAN_END_DATE_OF_PROVIDER_GROUP
message.locale: The 'To Date' must not be later than the 'End Date' of the Provider group, %1d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_GROUP_MEMBER_XRV_TO_DATE_EARLIER_THAN_ENROLLMENT_DATE_OF_PROVIDER_GROUP_MEMBER
message.locale: The 'To Date' must not be earlier than the 'Enrollment Date' of the Provider group member, %1d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_GROUP_MEMBER_XRV_TO_DATE_LATER_THAN_END_DATE_OF_PROVIDER_GROUP_MEMBER
message.locale: The 'To Date' must not be later than the 'End Date' of the Provider group member, %1d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_GROUP_MEMBER_XRV_PROVIDER_GROUP_MEMBER_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: %1s is already a provider group member from %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_GROUP_MEMBER_XRV_PROVIDER_GROUP_MEMBER_WITH_SAME_ROLE_EXISTS
message.locale: The specified provider group member with the same role may not exist for the provider group in the same period, %1d - %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_GROUP_MEMBER_XRV_PROVIDER_GROUP_MEMBER_WITH_SAME_ROLE_EXISTS_WITHOUT_END_DATE
message.locale: The specified provider group member with the same role may not exist for the provider group in the same period, %1d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_GROUP_MEMBER_XRV_CANNOT_UPDATE_CANCELLED_PROVIDER_GROUP_MEMBER
message.locale: This provider member has been deleted, it cannot be updated.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_GROUP_MEMBER_XRV_PARTICIPANTS_HAVING_DATE_OF_DEATH
message.locale: %1s is deceased with a date of death of %2d and cannot be a provider group member.
